original_title: 24 x 24: Wide Open with Jeff Gordon
overview: Explores the life both on and off the track of one of NASCAR racing's greatest and most beloved icons. The fast-paced documentary creates an in-depth look behind the man by spending one 24-hr-period with Jeff Gordon, as well as a documentary-style retrospective of his career and lifestyle. Get to know Jeff the driver, the family man, the adventurer, the entrepreneur, and the philanthropist.
title: 24 x 24: Wide Open with Jeff Gordon
